DOC.brief_summary: This study is to assess the efficacy of the fixed combination of Valsartan and Amlodipine in hypertensive patients uncontrolled by monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: A National Multicentre Study to Assess the Efficacy of the Fixed Combination of Valsartan and Amlodipine in Hypertensive Patients Not Controlled by Monotherapy
DOC.criteria: Patient uncontrolled by monotherapy for at least 8 weeks, having B.P.>/= 140/90 mmHg in non diabetics or >/= 130/80 mmHg in diabetics Patient having B.P.>= 180/110 mmHg in non diabetics or >= 160/100 mmHg in diabetics Type 1 Diabetes or uncontrolled type 2 Diabetes. PCI in last 12 months. Concomitant unstable angina. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
